properties.name: Tikal
properties.description: Mayan 'New York' with towering pyramids rising above jungle canopy, UNESCO World Heritage

properties.name: Lake Atitlan
properties.description: Volcanic lake surrounded by three volcanoes and traditional Mayan villages

properties.name: Antigua
properties.description: UNESCO colonial city with cobblestone streets, pastel buildings, and volcanic backdrop

properties.name: Semuc Champey
properties.description: Hidden turquoise limestone pools deep in the jungle with waterfalls and caves

properties.name: Acatenango Volcano
properties.description: Third-highest volcano in Central America with views of erupting Fuego volcano
